main_definition: to do something quickly or without delay.

meanings_and_examples.definition: acting immediately after an event occurs.
meanings_and_examples.example: The firefighters arrived promptly when they were called to the burning building.

meanings_and_examples.definition: responding quickly to a request or situation.
meanings_and_examples.example: She asked her assistant to send out invitations promptly for her upcoming event.

meanings_and_examples.definition: doing something without any unnecessary delay.
meanings_and_examples.example: The manager instructed his employees to complete the project promptly, ensuring it was finished on time.
